wikipedia_page.main:
Aidan Robert Nesbitt (born 5 February 1997) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Falkirk.
He has previously played for Partick Thistle, Dundee United, Milton Keynes Dons and Greenock Morton, after progressing through the Celtic youth academy.

link_mentions.page: Celtic F.C. Player of the Year
response: *Academy Player of the Year: Aidan Nesbitt
Aidan Nesbitt signed on loan on 9 August.
Alongside Aidan Nesbitt who won his first cap earlier in the season; Jai Quitongo received his first call-up to the Scotland U21 call-up.
Aidan Nesbitt's loan was extended until the end of the season.
